member.name: IActionProgress.Begin
member.summary: Called when an action has begun that requires its progress be displayed to the user.
member.param: The action being performed. See for a list of acceptable values.
Optional flags that request certain UI operations be enabled or disabled. See for a list of acceptable values.
member.returns: Return S_OK if successful, or an error value otherwise.

member.name: IActionProgress.End
member.summary: Indicates that the action associated with this progress implementation has ended.
member.returns: Return S_OK if successful, or an error value otherwise.

member.param: A reference to a BOOL value that specifies whether the action is being canceled.
member.returns: Return S_OK if successful, or an error value otherwise.

member.name: IActionProgress.ResetCancel

member.returns: Return S_OK if successful, or an error value otherwise.

The total amount of the action.

member.name: IActionProgress.UpdateText
